long description: Local Idea to Idea Mobile Calls @ 10p/min
Local Idea to Idea Mobile Calls @10p/min
Unlimited Local Idea to Idea Night Calls (11 pm to 6 am)

Unlimited Local + National Idea to Idea Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Get 5% Additional Talktime of MRP on recharges done exclusively on My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local and STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable.  -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
